name: Fuji
description: Fuji Lions is a collection of 1111 Lion Solana NFTs bringing $FUJI to the blockchain. Game Theory X Utility X Breeding. $FUJI will be used to breed lion cubs, feed newborn lions, and more game theory down the road. Overall our purpose with this project is to foster a real sense of community with some game theory intertwined within. The function of this project is bringing a successful NFT game theory project to Solana.
